#summary The h1 align attribute specifies the horizontal alignment of the element within its bounding box.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute

== Usage ==

The `align` attribute is deprecated in favor of the [TextAlignCSSProperty text-align CSS property], but browsers still support it.

== Values ==

  * `left` (default)
  * `center`
  * `right`

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
